title: League downgrades to old client only to update daily
body:
{{champion:103}} 
Not sure how to explain it well, but basically my client has been going back to the old version pretty much every day now for the last 2 weeks. It takes half an hour to update it back to the current one. It's not like it lets me play the old one, either. It just downgrades only to update automatically. Help?

replies.body:
Typically that means that the client noticed something wrong with some of the new patch files, and instead of just completely crashing every time it's built in a way that it can revert to the previous stable patch so it can try to repatch. Since that's happening every day, there might still be some corrupted files somewhere in your installation. 

Let's first try using this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the force repatch option turned on to see if that can clear up that patching issue.
